overview: Natasha (21) is participating in an organized trip to encourage immigration of Russian speaking descendants of Jews to Israel. On the second day, the group arrives to the desert. Two Israeli soldiers join them for the night and the girls all fall for Shlomi, the handsome combat soldier. When Natasha manages to catch his attention by revealing her plan to permanently stay in Israel right after the trip, her friends grow jealous and things turn ugly.
title: Birth Right
